metadata.title: CVE-2022-0400 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was discovered in linux kernel in thesmc protocol stack, causing remote dos.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
